attributes.action: Open a public enquiry into the treatment of the Star and Garter, Manchester
attributes.additional_details:
The poor quality of the area the Star and Garter stands in is referenced in the original Network Rail environmental report for the Northern Hub Project; http://bit.ly/1v0tdwe
London and Continental Railways and Manchester City Council are in partnership to redevelop the Mayfeild Railway Station which sits behind the Star and Garter; http://bit.ly/1KVxd3l

The Star and Garter will be sold on for profit once the development(s) are complete. The owners are being forced to sell now or face a CPO.
attributes.background: The Star and Garter is a 212 year old Grade 2 listed building adjacent to Piccadilly Station. It has operated as a live music venue, nightclub, film set and exhibition/conference venue since 1990. In 2016 it will have to close for the Northern Hub Project, so the owners are being forced to sell.
